news.title: Wey to lock crypto for profit and help protect the network, make e secure
news.subtitle: Sabi how to lock your crypto for profit and get am back from people wey dey hold crypto for you wey you fit use like regular money straight for MetaMask Portfolio.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Portfolio go make am easy for you to take part to dey lock your crypto for profit, wey be like helping hand to secure blockchain network, make e no collapse. You fit use the dapp wey dey easy to use to connect wit providers wey dey trusted to lock your coins for profit for you through di “Stake” ting.


Lock your crypto for profit straight up


With MetaMask Portfolio, you fit lock your ETH for profit with Lido and Rocket Pool, wey dey provide liquid staking, and you nor go need commot the dapp. Instead make you dey waka find oda websites or safe way to lock your coins for profit, you fit just use MetaMask Portfolio app itself for their "Stake" button, you go connect with Lido and Rocket Pool smart contracts directly.

We recently make way for people to lock MATIC for profit (for now, only for those wey dey outside U.S.A.) through Lido and Stader Labs. Remember say locking MATIC for profit na for Ethereum network dem dey do am.

Lock your crypto for profit, commot your moni, and dey monitor your crypto easy easy


Whether you dey new to dey lock your crypto for profit or you don already sabi am, MetaMask Portfolio dey make am easy to lock your crypto for profit your coins, remove dem and see how your reward dey increase all for one place. You no need to comot from the dapp to start help secure Ethereum network and get paid back for am.

Wey to lock your crypto for profit with MetaMask Portfolio


  1. Join your MetaMask wallet to portfolio.metamask.io
  2. Press "Stake" to start am and pick between ETH or MATIC.
  3. You fit choose which one you want wey go lock your coins for profit for you.
  4. Enta how much ETH or MATIC wey you wan lock for profit. You fit switch between "monthly" and "yearly" to see how much money you go get for locking dis amount for profit. When you don ready, pick “Review” to check your stake well well.
  5. Select 'Confirm' once you don review am, then sign the transaction for your wallet to approve and submit di transaction wey you lock for profit.
  6. Once the transaction done finish, make you go view your rewards wey don pile up for the holdings card, you go see how much you don get.

Success! 🦊

Staking, e dey benefit everybody


MetaMask Portfolio go allow you be part of something big wey no get one owner and public good wey everybody dey benefit from, wey dey help to protect the network wey blockchains dey use. You fit hep make Ethereum secure and grow and make dem reward you because of am by finding people wey go put their coin for staking. Whether you want withdraw your stake, use your stETH/rETH/stMATIC/MATICX tokens as collateral for DeFi, or even exchange am for anoda token, you fit do all those things for one place.

You dey ready to stake? Sabi plenti for metamask.io/portfolio/

MetaMask Portfolio: carry eye see and watch over all ya web3 kain things

MetaMask Portfolio na ogbonge platform wey dey easy to use and e get all ya web3 things for one place, e go hep you control everytin yourself. Through Dashboard, Buy, Swap, Bridge, and Stake, you dey safe. We dey always work hard to make di dapp better with updates wey go make sense. Tap here to sabi more about MetaMask Portfolio and all the kain things wey e fit do.

nodes.title: Transfers from Coinbase and Binance now available in MetaMask
nodes.subtitle: MetaMask launches new CEX transfer feature to make your wallet more powerful.

image.title: Centralized exchange transfers MetaMask now available
image.description: Centralized exchange transfers from Coinbase and Binance now available on MetaMask.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Portfolio now supports centralized exchange (CEX) transfers from Coinbase and Binance, streamlining the process of transferring assets to your crypto wallet.

Many web3 users have digital assets divided across multiple wallets and accounts, creating a fragmented experience. Moving assets from one platform to another can be overly complicated and involve many steps—fraught with the risks of copying and pasting addresses incorrectly, and potential security concerns. MetaMask’s new CEX transfer feature is a solution to this issue, making your wallet more powerful, while also strengthening security.

Instant transfer of assets from centralized exchanges into your MetaMask wallet

MetaMask CEX transfers allow you to immediately move assets between accounts, eliminating the need for manually entering addresses. And, if you have bank accounts linked to your Coinbase or Binance accounts, purchasing crypto directly with your bank account to your MetaMask wallet has never been easier. No additional KYC necessary.

In April 2024, MetaMask partnered with Meld and Mesh to launch a feature that allowed users to track external CEX balances by linking Coinbase or Binance accounts directly from the MetaMask Portfolio dashboard. Now, you can view CEX balances, and also transfer assets from these exchanges into your MetaMask wallet. Neither MetaMask, nor our partners in this integration, will ever have access to your exchange login credentials, or share your wallet addresses with third parties.

CEX transfers will initially support Coinbase or Binance accounts, with expansion to additional exchanges on the horizon. No fees will be charged when transferring digital assets from exchanges to MetaMask. A nominal transaction fee of 0.25% will be applied when transferring from MetaMask to centralized exchanges. Network gas fees also apply.

By bridging the gap between self-custodial and centralized platforms, MetaMask is paving the way for a more powerful, integrated, and user-friendly DeFi ecosystem. Head to MetaMask Portfolio today to get started with CEX transfers.

nodes.metaDescription: MetaMask launches new CEX transfer feature to make your wallet more powerful.

nodes.title: How gamers are empowered in web3
nodes.subtitle: Discover the builders who are transforming web3, in our More With MetaMask Partner Series.

image.title: More With MetaMask Partner Series Yooldo
image.description: More With MetaMask Partner Series Yooldo gaming

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask is the gateway to the decentralized web, enabling you to do more. Users can connect to any dapp, on any network, from any device. From DeFi to DeSci, gaming to NFTs, and beyond: MetaMask is passionate about the web3 community. The More With MetaMask Partner Series shines a light on builders who are innovating across web3. For Yooldo – a gaming community focused on security and autonomy – MetaMask is essential.

A new era of web3 gaming

In traditional online gaming, players' assets are controlled by the developer or publisher, and stored on centralized servers. This setup leaves users at risk of losing access to their digital items, which can happen for various reasons including a company modifying its policies, or shutting down the game. In web3 gaming, players have full ownership of their digital assets, independent of the game itself. This decentralization ensures that Yooldo gamers have complete control over their assets, with no monolithic authority able to restrict access or manipulate users’ holdings.

How MetaMask keeps gaming assets safe

With self-custody comes gamers' responsibility for maintaining safety of their own assets. The decentralized security that MetaMask offers is vital for Yooldo gamers. Users have control over their private keys, which means that even in the case of a data breach, gaming assets will remain secure. All actions on Yooldo are also transparent and traceable – whether purchasing an in-game asset, or interacting with the platform. And, each transaction requires user approval, via blockchain’s cryptographic validation and consensus protocols.

Another critical feature that safeguards users is phishing protection, powered by MetaMask and ChainPatrol’s Eth-Phishing-Protect. MetaMask provides in-app warnings, and domain verification systems to protect users from dubious links and attacks. This allows Yooldo gamers to be alerted to potentially malicious websites quickly and efficiently.

Empowering gamers through decentralization

As the web3 ecosystem grows, security is of the utmost importance. Gamers can store, buy, sell, and trade their in-game assets directly, without worrying about data breaches, server failures, or third-party interference. More broadly, MetaMask enables players to transfer assets between different games, or wider marketplaces. Digital gaming assets earned in Yooldo can be sold or traded for tokens with real-world value, extending their utility beyond gameplay. No matter where you are in your web3 gaming journey, MetaMask continues to offer more ways to stay secure.

Ready to dive into web3 gaming? Head to Yooldo to get started.

nodes.title: MetaMask now compatible with NGRAVE hardware wallet
nodes.subtitle: For a more secure self-custody experience.

image.title: MetaMask hardware wallet integration NGRAVE
image.description: MetaMask now has hardware wallet integration with NGRAVE

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask has announced its integration with NGRAVE on Extension and Mobile, enhancing security of users’ digital assets. By leveraging both MetaMask hot wallet and NGRAVE ZERO hardware wallet, users can benefit from convenience and accessibility, while maintaining the highest levels of security.

Increased security

Because hardware wallets are offline, they significantly reduce the risk of being hacked, and unauthorized access to users’ private keys. Hardware wallets, sometimes called “cold wallets” also serve as a secure backup for private keys, ensuring that primary assets remain safe even if the hot wallet is compromised. Since users retain total control over their private keys, the integration expands self-custody management of their crypto assets. Additionally, as hardware wallets are online by default, MetaMask stays up-to-date with alerts, to minimize the risk of phishing attacks and malware that typically target hot wallets.

Convenience and accessibility

Users can quickly access and manage their funds through their MetaMask hot wallet, allowing them to buy, sell, transfer, bridge, stake, and more – while signing fully offline via their hardware wallet. This avoids compromising the security of larger holdings stored in the hardware wallet. MetaMask wallet allows for seamless transactions, without moving assets between different wallets frequently. A streamlined integration between hot and cold wallets provides a smoother user experience, making it easier for novice and experienced users to manage their assets versatile and securely.

Note: for the MetaMask browser extension, the minimum required version to use the NGRAVE integration is v. 12.3.0. For the MetaMask app, the minimum required version is v. 7.31.1.

How to use MetaMask with NGRAVE



Sync MetaMask with NGRAVE ZERO

  1. On your ZERO, go to Settings → Sync → MetaMask. This will display a QR code.
  2. In MetaMask, go to Account Selector → Add Account Or Hardware Wallet → Add Hardware Wallet.
  3. Click QR-based → Continue – this will open the camera.
  4. Scan the QR code on your ZERO by holding it in front of your webcam or phone camera.
  5. MetaMask will show a list of the ETH accounts on your ZERO. (Note: This list will contain all ETH addresses for your wallet, regardless of how many you already had created on ZERO.) Select which wallet addresses you want to have available via MetaMask.
  6. MetaMask will now show your ZERO accounts that you have synced.
  7. If you want to add or remove accounts in MetaMask, repeat this process.

Transact with MetaMask and NGRAVE ZERO



Make a transaction request in MetaMask

  1. Open MetaMask Extension in your browser, and select the NGRAVE account of your choice.
  2. Click Send, and select the token and the amount you would like to send. Then, enter your destination address.
  3. Click Continue. This will show you the transaction details. Make sure they are correct. Consider making a screenshot or a note of the transaction details. By the time ZERO will show you the details for verification, MetaMask will no longer display them.
  4. When you are ready, click Confirm.

Scan the QR code generated by MetaMask with ZERO

  1. On ZERO, tap on the blue scan icon in the right top of the dashboard, or tap on the coin you want to send funds from and tap Send. This will open the camera on your ZERO for you to scan the MetaMask QR code.

Verify the transaction before signing it with ZERO

  1. ZERO will display all the transaction details. Verify the transaction details on your ZERO screen. It is essential to make sure that they match the details you entered in MetaMask. In some cases, the transaction can't be decoded or part of the decoded transaction can't be interpreted. Make sure you understand the risks of blind signing and take appropriate measures to protect your funds. Find out more about staying safe in Web3.
  2. If everything is correct, sign the transaction request offline with your PIN. If required by your settings, you will be asked for your fingerprint.
  3. You will now see the signed transaction in the form of a QR code on your ZERO.

Scan the QR code generated by ZERO with MetaMask

  1. In Metamask, click Get Signature to open your computer's camera.
  2. Scan the NGRAVE ZERO signature QR code with MetaMask. The image of the QR code will appear blurred for security reasons. It will not affect the reading.

Success! 🦊

Learn more about how you can enjoy MetaMask's features with NGRAVE's hardwallet integration in MetaMask's Hardware Wallet Hub, and get started.

nodes.metaDescription: MetaMask has announced its integration with NGRAVE on Extension and Mobile, enhancing security of users’ digital assets.
